sentences.sContent: What do you think should be expected in the future?
sentences.sContent_eng: What do you think should be expected in the future?
sentences.sCn: 你认为什么会是在将来可以期待的？

sentences.sContent: I have high hopes for what the initiative – and all of us – can do together in the future.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have high hopes for what the initiative – and all of us – can do together in the future.
sentences.sCn: 我对这个项目，对所有人都寄予厚望，我们在未来可以携手合作，共同面对。
